title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 153.2 - Rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 153.2 - Rules and regulations

State Regulations
(a) The

Board of Education of the City School District of the City of New York shall
file with the department on or before April 30, 1974, a copy of rules and
regulations which have been promulgated by such board, or promulgated by the
chancellor and approved by such board, concerning the operation of such
umbrella programs. Such rules and regulations shall include; but not be limited
to: (1)
the scope and sequence of
programs; (2)
administration and
supervision of such programs; (3)
fiscal controls and auditing procedures; (4)
program evaluation; (5)
program monitoring; (6)
employee qualifications and salary
levels; (7)
program accountability
and reporting; (8)
management and
administrative organization. (b) Upon the approval of the commissioner of
such rules and regulations, the city school district of the City of New York
shall be eligible to receive the funds appropriated for the purposes of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
153.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
